title: The Success Factor: Your 1 Hour Guide to Achieving Your Personal and Professional Goals
description: The Success Factor is your one hour guide to helping you achieve your personal and professional goals. This book examines the winning traits or habits of highly successful individuals as it relates to goal achievement and shares with the reader some simple strategies to help the reader achieve his/her goals. The author also helps the reader create an action plan, and also addresses time management and procrastination issues. No matter what you do for a livingâ€”business owner, business professional, tradesman, or student, the goal of this book is to help inspire and motivate the reader to take action and to help them achieve their goals and dreams.
author: Renato Amarena
